data.comment: Today's referee, Masuya Ueda, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 2, Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Yokohama Marinos are pushing forward but Erik's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Hayato Nakama gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashiwa.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 5, Kashiwa drives forward and Ataru Esaka gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Important block from the Yokohama Marinos defence as Takuma Ominami fires in a strike for Kashiwa.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Kashiwa are coming forward and Taiyo Koga gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
In the minute 9, Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Kashiwa Kashiwa attack through Ataru Esaka. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 11, Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Masuya Ueda awards the home team a throw-in.
Kashiwa's Michael Olunga gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
In the minute 15, Ken Matsubara for Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Masuya Ueda awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 17, Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
At Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium, Thiago Martins has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 21, Kashiwa's Michael Olunga misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Masuya Ueda signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Kashiwa's area.
In the minute 22, Yokohama Marinos are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Masuya Ueda signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
In the minute 24, Yokohama Marinos's Erik gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kashiwa defender.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Masuya Ueda.
In the minute 29, Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
At Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium, Yokohama Marinos are penalized for being offside.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 34, Kashiwa push forward at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium and Ataru Esaka gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Yokohama Marinos defence.
Sachiro Toshima is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Hiromu Mitsumaru (Kashiwa) has replaced the possibly injured Sachiro Toshima.
In the minute 37, Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Masuya Ueda.
Kashiwa's Kengo Kitazume breaks free at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
In the minute 38, Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Kashiwa have an attacking throw-in.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashiwa in Kashiwa.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In the minute 40, Goal! Michael Olunga heads Kashiwa into a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Hiromu Mitsumaru.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 42, In Kashiwa, Marcos Junior of Yokohama Marinos is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 43, Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Can Kashiwa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
Michael Olunga (Kashiwa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, At Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Masuya Ueda signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Kashiwa's area.
In the minute 45, Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Kashiwa.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
In the minute 45, Masuya Ueda signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
The first-half is over at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 46, Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
In the minute 46, Takahiro Ogihara is replacing Ken Matsubara for the away team.
The away team replace Ado Onaiwu with Teruhito Nakagawa.
Kashiwa's Tatsuya Yamashita attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Masuya Ueda awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos's Marcos Junior breaks free at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
In the minute 50, Kashiwa's Ataru Esaka gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Yokohama Marinos defender.
Kashiwa are caught offside.
Kashiwa drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 52, Kashiwa are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Masuya Ueda awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
In the minute 57, Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Masuya Ueda signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In the minute 59, Kashiwa are caught offside.
Yokohama Marinos pushes forward through Theerathon Bunmathan, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Hiromu Mitsumaru of Kashiwa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Yokohama Marinos have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 63, Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daizen Maeda is on a sub for Marcos Junior for Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 64, Taiyo Koga is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Taiyo Koga has recovered and rejoins the match in Kashiwa.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 66, Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Masuya Ueda.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 67, Important block from the Kashiwa defence as Teruhito Nakagawa fires in a strike for Yokohama Marinos.
Makito Ito of Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Kashiwa's Masatoshi Mihara has been booked in Kashiwa.
In the minute 70, Yokohama Marinos drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In Kashiwa Kashiwa attack through Kengo Kitazume. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 71, Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Free kick Kashiwa.
Yokohama Marinos are coming forward and Erik gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
Yokohama Marinos push upfield but Masuya Ueda quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashiwa in Kashiwa.
Kashiwa make their second substitution with Shunki Takahashi replacing Kengo Kitazume.
In the minute 76, Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Erik gets an equalizer for Yokohama Marinos. The score is now 1-1.
Teruhito Nakagawa instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 78, In Kashiwa, Yokohama Marinos push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Nelsinho Baptista (Kashiwa) is making a third substitution, with Richardson replacing Masatoshi Mihara.
In the minute 83, Own goal! Takuma Ominami has scored at the wrong end to make it 1-2.
The away team replace Kota Watanabe with Takuya Wada.
Masuya Ueda awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Masuya Ueda.
Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Masuya Ueda signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos advance rapidly upfield but Masuya Ueda blows for offside.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Yokohama Marinos will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kashiwa.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kashiwa.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-3.
It's now 1-3 in Kashiwa as Daizen Maeda scores for Yokohama Marinos.
Great play from Teruhito Nakagawa to set up the goal.
Yokohama Marinos make their fifth substitution with Edigar Junio replacing Erik.
